scripts.build-backend: cd backend && deno run --allow-env --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --unstable https://deno.land/x/denopack@0.8.0/cli.ts -c denopack.config.ts
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && deno run --allow-env --allow-net --allow-read --allow-write --unstable https://deno.land/x/denopack@0.8.0/cli.ts -c denopack.config.ts
scripts.frontend: cd frontend && deno run --allow-env --allow-net --allow-read --allow-run main.ts -- --browse serve
